title: Reliable, Fast & Locally Owned
text: At Clean Slate Pressure Washing, we deliver professional, efficient, and high-quality service with every job. Whether it’s residential, commercial, or vehicle detailing, we’re committed to making your property look its best.

section.title: Why Choose Us?
section.content: We show up on time, treat your property with care, and leave it cleaner than we found it. With top-rated customer service and attention to detail, we aim to exceed expectations every time.

section.title: Locally Owned & Operated
section.content: We’re a small business built by a local family that takes pride in serving our community. When you hire Clean Slate, you support real people—not a big chain.
